Navigate to 'https://www.example.com/'

Ensure the 'Shop Now' button is enabled, positioned at x 50% and y 70%, with padding 15px 30px, and has border radius 8px

Confirm the primary product image has source 'product_main.jpg', is loaded within 500ms, natural dimensions 1200x900px, rendered dimensions 600x450px, and its alt text contains 'Premium quality watch'
Check the image gallery displays 4 thumbnails, each 100px wide, 75px high, has border 1px solid #cccccc, with margin-right 10px
Access the user profile edit form

In the shopping cart, verify the item count is 2
Confirm each item row has background color #ffffff, height 150px, and margin-bottom 10px
Check the item name text 'Wireless Headphones' has font weight 700 and color #333333

Trigger a success notification
